content.question: The function <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> has the property that as <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> gets closer and closer to 4, the values of <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> get closer and closer to 7. Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 4, of, f of x, equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the limit as x approaches 7, of, f of x, equals 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></munder><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 4, of, f of x, equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></munder><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.2: Defining Limits and Using Limit Notation

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
